siteMetadata.title: rantum.dev
siteMetadata.subtitle: digital dwelling of andrew maury. digital developer @ecomloop in burlingame, ca. san matean nantucketer on a rantum scoot.

frontmatter.title: Quality of life loss normalization
frontmatter.description: Much has been lost in terms of quality of life. This cannot become the new standard. Strive for even better than before.

frontmatter.title: Mindfully rational
frontmatter.description: Everyone is consumed by more than what's on the surface. Every interaction in influenced by any number of unknown past experiences.

frontmatter.title: Smoky conditions during a pandemic
frontmatter.description: smoky late summer. interrupts outdoor escapes. oh, the pandemic.

frontmatter.title: Staying active inside during the pandemic
frontmatter.description: Physical activity brings many benefits to moods, outlooks, and physical health. Develop routines to stay active indoors with the kids. Don't fall into a pattern of waiting for the right conditions to get moving again.

frontmatter.title: The longest school year awaits
frontmatter.description: This will be the longest year regardless of setting. It looks unlikely to have in-person this year. Schedules change. We adjust. It will be a long year.

frontmatter.title: Plan for contingencies
frontmatter.description: There will be interruptions ahead. Plan for likely scenarios and recognize it won't go as planned.

frontmatter.title: Socializing sparks spontaneity
frontmatter.description: Make time to socialize to spark new ideas.

frontmatter.title: Anticipate short notice changes
frontmatter.description: Expect shot-notice changes. Make contingency plans. Don't get stuck without a plan.

frontmatter.title: Home is comfort not a place
frontmatter.description: Home is more than a place. It's a feeling of comfort and connection. Seek

frontmatter.title: Create own rules to safely proceed
frontmatter.description: Keep in mind what can be controlled. Create own rules as needed.
